Interface PegSolitaireGame

  • public interface PegSolitaireGame
    Interface PegSolitaireGame provides generic methods to implement for any type of Peg Solitaire game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean endGame()
      Method to check if game is ended or not.
      int getNumOfPeg()
      Method to get total number of pegs.
      void loadFile()
      It reads some information from given file and loads the game according to that file.
      void makeMove()
      Performs movement.
      void playAuto()
      Performs single random movement.
      void playAutoAll()
      Makes random move till the game ends.
      void resetBoard()
      It sets the board its initial state.
      void saveFile()
      It saves some information about the game to file.
      void undoMove()
      It takes back the last move, sets the board its previous state.

    • Method Detail

      • endGame

        boolean endGame()
        Method to check if game is ended or not.
        Returns:
        It returns true if game is ended, otherwise returns false.

      • getNumOfPeg

        int getNumOfPeg()
        Method to get total number of pegs.
        Returns:
        It returns integer which represents total number of pegs.

      • resetBoard

        void resetBoard()
        It sets the board its initial state.

      • makeMove

        void makeMove()
        Performs movement.

      • playAuto

        void playAuto()
        Performs single random movement.

      • playAutoAll

        void playAutoAll()
        Makes random move till the game ends.

      • undoMove

        void undoMove()
        It takes back the last move, sets the board its previous state.

      • saveFile

        void saveFile()
        It saves some information about the game to file.

      • loadFile

        void loadFile()
        It reads some information from given file and loads the game according to that file.
